item.title: Version 1.2.17 (Build 20251231)
item.description:
What's New

feat: add custom hotkey support for Temp Off Toolbar and improve toggle logic

  • Add customizable hotkey for showing/hiding Temp Off Toolbar via EventTapManager
  • Implement minimum modifiers requirement (2+) to avoid conflicts with Ctrl/Option toggles
  • Add HotkeyRecorderView with preset options and validation
  • Add settings observer to enable/disable toolbar dynamically

Improve Ctrl/Option toggle behavior:

  • Add cooldown period (500ms) after hotkey toggle to prevent race conditions
  • Track modifier key press/release separately to detect single modifier usage
  • Cancel toggle if other modifiers or keys are pressed during hold

Refactor toolbar management:

  • Split setupTempOffToolbar into enableTempOffToolbar/disableTempOffToolbar
  • Move hotkey setup from NSEvent monitors to EventTapManager for better event handling
  • Add notification for toolbar settings changes (tempOffToolbarSettingsDidChange)

Clean up code:

  • Remove debug logging statements from positioning logic
  • Remove unused getElementBounds method
  • Remove unnecessary coordinate conversion logging
  • Improve positioning fallback with saved mouse position

Update version to 20251231
